title: Smallest sample size for cereal commercial viewers

content.question: A commercial for a breakfast cereal is shown during a certain television program. The manufacturer of the cereal wants to estimate the percent of television viewers who watch the program. The manufacturer wants the estimate to have a margin of error of at most 0.02 at a level of 95 percent confidence. Of the following, which is the smallest sample size that will satisfy the manufacturerâ€™s requirements?
